div.bibl: Chicagoer Arbeiter Zeitung, Apr. 8, 1884. [A SOCIALIST MEETING]

body.p: The Group of the Town of Lake held the regular agitation meeting last Saturday in their Hall. Comrade Reentz presided. Comrade Schiffner held a lecture about Socialism, which was well received and provoked a lively debate in which a number of those present participated.
After a resolution to postpone the question of arming till the next meeting, and the admission of a few new members, the meeting adjorned.
